title: Add admin gift pack creation and management

requirements.summary: Create GiftPackForm component for admin gift pack creation with validation and shadcn/ui components
acceptanceCriteria: Form includes all required fields: ID, title, description, price, discount, category, image URL, basket type, size
Form validation prevents submission with missing required fields
Category dropdown is populated from existing categories
Basket type and size use select components matching existing patterns
Form styling matches existing admin forms (CategoryForm, CouponForm)

file_operations.description: Create a form component using react-hook-form with validation for gift pack creation. Include fields for: pack ID (text input), title (text input), description (textarea), price (number input), discount percentage (number input 0-100), category (select populated from useCategories hook), image URL (text input), basket type (select with options: wickerBasket, woodenCrate, giftBox), and size (select with options: small, medium, large). Follow the pattern established in ProductForm.tsx with shadcn/ui Input, Textarea, Select, and Button components. Use Zod schema for validation ensuring all fields are required. Include loading state on submit button.

requirements.summary: Create GiftPackList component to display all gift packs in a responsive grid with loading and empty states
acceptanceCriteria: Displays all gift packs in a responsive grid
Shows key product details on each card
Includes loading skeleton during data fetch
Shows appropriate empty state when no gift packs exist

file_operations.description: Create a component that fetches all gift packs using the useGiftPacks hook. Display them in a responsive grid (grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3) using Card components. Each card should show: gift pack image (using img tag with images[0]?.getDirectURL() or placeholder), title, price with discount indicator, category badge, basket type, and size. Use Skeleton components from shadcn/ui during loading state (isLoading). Show an empty state message when no gift packs exist (!giftPacks || giftPacks.length === 0). Follow the styling patterns from CategoryList.tsx and CouponList.tsx.

requirements.summary: Create GiftPackManagement component that combines form and list with mutation handling and toast notifications
acceptanceCriteria: Successfully creates gift packs using existing backend integration
Shows success toast notification after creation
Shows error toast if creation fails
Form resets to empty state after successful submission
Gift pack list automatically updates after creation

file_operations.description: Create a container component that combines GiftPackForm and GiftPackList. Use the existing useProductMutation hook for gift pack creation. Handle form submission by calling the mutation with gift pack data, converting price and discount to BigInt and image URL to ExternalBlob array. On successful creation, display a success toast using the toast hook from shadcn/ui, reset the form (pass reset function as prop to GiftPackForm), and the list will auto-update via React Query cache invalidation. On error, display an error toast with the error message. Follow the pattern established in CategoryManagement.tsx and CouponManagement.tsx with proper spacing between form and list sections.

requirements.summary: Update AdminPage to add Gift Pack Management section alongside existing management sections
acceptanceCriteria: Gift Pack Management section appears on admin dashboard
Section follows same visual styling as existing sections
Section includes clear title and description

file_operations.description: Add a fourth management section for Gift Packs to the existing AdminPage. Import the GiftPackManagement component and add it below the existing Coupon Management section. Wrap it in a Card component with CardHeader containing CardTitle 'Gift Pack Management' and CardDescription 'Create and manage gift pack products'. Maintain consistent spacing (space-y-8) and layout with the existing three sections. Ensure the page remains scrollable and responsive.
